content: **christmas wish star crochet coasters** make these really easy christmas wish star coasters in no time to decorate your holiday table great for gift giving too **skill level ** easy basic stitches simple shaping and finishing **yarn ** nurturing fibres - eco-cotton dk - small amounts - approx 10 grams of each color for each coaster color mist ruby pink and willow **hook ** 3 25 mm but any hook can be used depending on size required **notes ** due to the nature of this pattern the yarn and hook used is only a suggestion and any substitute may be used size of finished product will vary depending on yarn and also size of hook used takes about 15 min to 30 min to make one depending on how quick you crochet **size ** approx 12 cm in diameter **abbreviations us terminology** **pattern support** full pattern support is available from the joanita theron designs facebook group or/and joanita theron designs ravelry group please post a question in the group and remember to tag me i will assist as soon as possible or one of my members will gladly jump in to help for questions relating to permission or usage email joanita@creativecrochetworkshop com
